title: Unmasked Alloy
description: Genetically enhanced humans populate earth. Flaws are prohibited. Refusing to be altered means death—unless you can successfully evade capture.Dake is one of these sub-norms on the run, and Eden’s status as a malfunctioning GenEn isn’t much better.When Eden flees with Dake, their spree as fugitives is all too brief. Captured and thrown into a government holding facility where the only likely outcome is execution, the pair seeks help from an unlikely and untrustworthy ally.In this second installment of the Sub-Normal series, trust and justice mix it up with the hyper-powered.
author: Becca J. Campbell
